alert.note: Alert for Allen (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Allen County through 700 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spencerville In Allen County, or 7 miles south of Delphos, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph along with heavy downpours. Road ponding and localized nuisance flooding possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elida around 635 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lima and Fort Shawnee. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 119 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
